channel.title: Quest Interface Editing
channel.description:
Base: InsidiaX
Hi,
I need some help editing the quest interface. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ex8qy8.png[/img] I can't find how to remove this guy from the background or the OWNER, Website & forums and FREE QUESTS , i already edited most of the quest texts in client.java but notheing related to any bg or the Blod text, is it in the client it self or what?

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Why not just change the image sprite.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @asmo11 asmo11
item.description:
@asmo11 wrote:

Sorry guys, didn’t start java to long ago. New to rsps development. I don’t really understand this child method or the other methods :S

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

matzie:

remove the child from the parent, that contains the sprite as a child. Redundancy ftw

I did for him, and then he tried re adding it :palm:

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

remove the child from the parent, that contains the sprite as a child. Redundancy ftw

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @asmo11 asmo11
item.description:
@asmo11 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:528348”][quote author=asmo11 link=topic=647097.msg4352056#msg4352056 date=1376825591]
everytime i chnage it this keeps happening?

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


[/quote]
Because it’s calling for something that doesn’t exist. Thessala’s shop is like the null image for spirtes, like dwarf remains are null for items.[/quote]
I’m totally stuck,when i try to remove the comments and change the setchild method to the necessary ammount for the array (so it doesn’t show unexpected error for out of expectation) it either shows me Thessala’s store or the client bugs up when loading? how should i change the code so it allows my backgrond to come back in but I don’t want it to read sprite for the ring

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yes, that’s because you have to also uncomment the setBounds, and you need to change how many children there are…
setChildren(2, Interface);

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @asmo11 asmo11
item.description:
@asmo11 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:528348”]Try this.:

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){ RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638); setChildren(2, Interface); addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //AddInterfaceButton(29156, 1, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "archievement tab", 1); //addSprite(29157, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface); //setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface); //setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 1, Interface); Interface = addInterface(29160); Interface.height = 214; Interface.width = 165; Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.newScroller = false; setChildren(105, Interface); addText(29161, "Owner :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0); addHoverText(29162, "Rex", "Owners", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0); addHoverText(29164, "http://dragonic-scape.tk/", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface); setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface); setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface); setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface); int Ypos = 83; int frameID = 5; for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){ addHoverText(iD, "", "View Quest"/*"View Quest Journal, "+iD*/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface); frameID++; Ypos += 15; Ypos++; } Interface = addInterface(29265); try { setChildren(4, Interface); addText(29266, " ", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2); AddInterfaceButton(29267, 2, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Swap to Quest Diary", 1); addSprite(29269, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); setBounds(29266, 10, 5, 0, Interface); setBounds(29267, 165, 5, 1, Interface); setBounds(29269, 3, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(29268, 5, 29, 3, Interface); Interface = addInterface(29268); Interface.height = 214; Interface.width = 165; Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.newScroller = false; setChildren(20, Interface); setBounds(29295, 8, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(29296, 8, 16, 1, Interface); setBounds(29297, 8, 29, 2, Interface); setBounds(29298, 8, 42, 3, Interface); setBounds(29299, 8, 54, 4, Interface); setBounds(29300, 8, 66, 5, Interface); setBounds(29301, 8, 78, 6, Interface); setBounds(29302, 8, 90, 7, Interface); setBounds(29303, 8, 102, 8, Interface); setBounds(29304, 8, 114, 9, Interface); setBounds(29305, 8, 126, 10, Interface); setBounds(29306, 8, 138, 11, Interface); setBounds(29307, 8, 150, 12, Interface); setBounds(29308, 8, 162, 13, Interface); setBounds(29309, 8, 174, 14, Interface); setBounds(29310, 8, 186, 15, Interface); setBounds(29311, 8, 198, 16, Interface); setBounds(29312, 8, 210, 17, Interface); setBounds(29313, 8, 222, 18, Interface); setBounds(29314, 8, 234, 19, Interface); addHoverText(29295, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29296, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29297, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29298, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29299, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29300, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29301, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29302, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29303, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29304, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29305, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29306, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29307, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29308, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29309, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29310, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29311, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29312, " ", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29313, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29314, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); } catch(Exception e){ e.printStackTrace(); } } [/quote]

It worked! Thanks alot

But the FREE QUEST is still there
when i try to change the 3rd setbounds to a comment this happens:

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot

Also i just added a new sprite (without the primal guy) what should i change back for this to be readable?
it currently looks like

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


when i try removing the // from addSprite(29157, 0, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”); it doesn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Try this.:

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){
      RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638);
      setChildren(2, Interface);
      addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
      //AddInterfaceButton(29156, 1, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "archievement tab", 1);
      //addSprite(29157, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST");
      setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
      //setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
      //setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 1, Interface);
      Interface = addInterface(29160);
      Interface.height = 214;
      Interface.width = 165;
      Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
      Interface.newScroller = false;
      setChildren(105, Interface);
      addText(29161, "Owner :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0);
      addHoverText(29162, "Rex", "Owners", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
      addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0);
      addHoverText(29164, "http://dragonic-scape.tk/", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
      setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface);
      setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface);
      setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface);
      setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface);
      int Ypos = 83;
      int frameID = 5;
      for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){
         addHoverText(iD, "", "View Quest"/*"View Quest Journal, "+iD*/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface);
         frameID++;
         Ypos += 15;
         Ypos++;
      }
      Interface = addInterface(29265);
      try {
         setChildren(4, Interface);
         addText(29266, " ", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
         AddInterfaceButton(29267, 2, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Swap to Quest Diary", 1);
         addSprite(29269, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST");
         setBounds(29266, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
         setBounds(29267, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
         setBounds(29269, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
         setBounds(29268, 5, 29, 3, Interface);
         Interface = addInterface(29268);
         Interface.height = 214;
         Interface.width = 165;
         Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
         Interface.newScroller = false;
         setChildren(20, Interface);
         setBounds(29295, 8, 4, 0, Interface);
         setBounds(29296, 8, 16, 1, Interface);
         setBounds(29297, 8, 29, 2, Interface);
         setBounds(29298, 8, 42, 3, Interface);
         setBounds(29299, 8, 54, 4, Interface);
         setBounds(29300, 8, 66, 5, Interface);
         setBounds(29301, 8, 78, 6, Interface);
         setBounds(29302, 8, 90, 7, Interface);
         setBounds(29303, 8, 102, 8, Interface);
         setBounds(29304, 8, 114, 9, Interface);
         setBounds(29305, 8, 126, 10, Interface);
         setBounds(29306, 8, 138, 11, Interface);
         setBounds(29307, 8, 150, 12, Interface);
         setBounds(29308, 8, 162, 13, Interface);
         setBounds(29309, 8, 174, 14, Interface);
         setBounds(29310, 8, 186, 15, Interface);
         setBounds(29311, 8, 198, 16, Interface);
         setBounds(29312, 8, 210, 17, Interface);
         setBounds(29313, 8, 222, 18, Interface);
         setBounds(29314, 8, 234, 19, Interface);
         addHoverText(29295, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29296, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29297, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29298, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29299, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29300, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29301, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29302, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29303, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29304, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29305, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29306, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29307, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29308, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29309, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29310, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29311, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29312, " ", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29313, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29314, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         } catch(Exception e){
            e.printStackTrace();
      }   
   }

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @asmo11 asmo11
item.description:
@asmo11 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:528348”]The interface button you removed was the dungeoneering icon you see in the top right corner.
The second one was the background (I believe)
This is why you crashed:
setChildren(4, Interface);
See how it says 4?

      setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
      setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
      setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface);

That’s the 4.
This should make it work properly:

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){ RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638); setChildren(2, Interface); addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //AddInterfaceButton(29156, 1, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "archievement tab", 1); //addSprite(29157, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface); //setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface); //setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface); Interface = addInterface(29160); Interface.height = 214; Interface.width = 165; Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.newScroller = false; setChildren(105, Interface); addText(29161, "Owner :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0); addHoverText(29162, "Rex", "Owners", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0); addHoverText(29164, "http://dragonic-scape.tk/", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface); setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface); setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface); setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface); int Ypos = 83; int frameID = 5; for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){ addHoverText(iD, "", "View Quest"/*"View Quest Journal, "+iD*/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface); frameID++; Ypos += 15; Ypos++; } Interface = addInterface(29265); try { setChildren(4, Interface); addText(29266, " ", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2); AddInterfaceButton(29267, 2, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Swap to Quest Diary", 1); addSprite(29269, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); setBounds(29266, 10, 5, 0, Interface); setBounds(29267, 165, 5, 1, Interface); setBounds(29269, 3, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(29268, 5, 29, 3, Interface); Interface = addInterface(29268); Interface.height = 214; Interface.width = 165; Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.newScroller = false; setChildren(20, Interface); setBounds(29295, 8, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(29296, 8, 16, 1, Interface); setBounds(29297, 8, 29, 2, Interface); setBounds(29298, 8, 42, 3, Interface); setBounds(29299, 8, 54, 4, Interface); setBounds(29300, 8, 66, 5, Interface); setBounds(29301, 8, 78, 6, Interface); setBounds(29302, 8, 90, 7, Interface); setBounds(29303, 8, 102, 8, Interface); setBounds(29304, 8, 114, 9, Interface); setBounds(29305, 8, 126, 10, Interface); setBounds(29306, 8, 138, 11, Interface); setBounds(29307, 8, 150, 12, Interface); setBounds(29308, 8, 162, 13, Interface); setBounds(29309, 8, 174, 14, Interface); setBounds(29310, 8, 186, 15, Interface); setBounds(29311, 8, 198, 16, Interface); setBounds(29312, 8, 210, 17, Interface); setBounds(29313, 8, 222, 18, Interface); setBounds(29314, 8, 234, 19, Interface); addHoverText(29295, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29296, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29297, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29298, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29299, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29300, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29301, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29302, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29303, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29304, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29305, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29306, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29307, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29308, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29309, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29310, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29311, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29312, " ", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29313, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29314, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); } catch(Exception e){ e.printStackTrace(); } } [/quote]

Thanks for the reply but an error occured while running the client

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The interface button you removed was the dungeoneering icon you see in the top right corner.
The second one was the background (I believe)
This is why you crashed:
setChildren(4, Interface);
See how it says 4?

      setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
      setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
      setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface);

That’s the 4.
This should make it work properly:

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){
      RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638);
      setChildren(2, Interface);
      addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
      //AddInterfaceButton(29156, 1, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "archievement tab", 1);
      //addSprite(29157, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST");
      setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
      //setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
      //setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface);
      Interface = addInterface(29160);
      Interface.height = 214;
      Interface.width = 165;
      Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
      Interface.newScroller = false;
      setChildren(105, Interface);
      addText(29161, "Owner :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0);
      addHoverText(29162, "Rex", "Owners", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
      addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0);
      addHoverText(29164, "http://dragonic-scape.tk/", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
      setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface);
      setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface);
      setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface);
      setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface);
      setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface);
      int Ypos = 83;
      int frameID = 5;
      for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){
         addHoverText(iD, "", "View Quest"/*"View Quest Journal, "+iD*/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface);
         frameID++;
         Ypos += 15;
         Ypos++;
      }
      Interface = addInterface(29265);
      try {
         setChildren(4, Interface);
         addText(29266, " ", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
         AddInterfaceButton(29267, 2, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Swap to Quest Diary", 1);
         addSprite(29269, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST");
         setBounds(29266, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
         setBounds(29267, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
         setBounds(29269, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
         setBounds(29268, 5, 29, 3, Interface);
         Interface = addInterface(29268);
         Interface.height = 214;
         Interface.width = 165;
         Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
         Interface.newScroller = false;
         setChildren(20, Interface);
         setBounds(29295, 8, 4, 0, Interface);
         setBounds(29296, 8, 16, 1, Interface);
         setBounds(29297, 8, 29, 2, Interface);
         setBounds(29298, 8, 42, 3, Interface);
         setBounds(29299, 8, 54, 4, Interface);
         setBounds(29300, 8, 66, 5, Interface);
         setBounds(29301, 8, 78, 6, Interface);
         setBounds(29302, 8, 90, 7, Interface);
         setBounds(29303, 8, 102, 8, Interface);
         setBounds(29304, 8, 114, 9, Interface);
         setBounds(29305, 8, 126, 10, Interface);
         setBounds(29306, 8, 138, 11, Interface);
         setBounds(29307, 8, 150, 12, Interface);
         setBounds(29308, 8, 162, 13, Interface);
         setBounds(29309, 8, 174, 14, Interface);
         setBounds(29310, 8, 186, 15, Interface);
         setBounds(29311, 8, 198, 16, Interface);
         setBounds(29312, 8, 210, 17, Interface);
         setBounds(29313, 8, 222, 18, Interface);
         setBounds(29314, 8, 234, 19, Interface);
         addHoverText(29295, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29296, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29297, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29298, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29299, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29300, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29301, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29302, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29303, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29304, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29305, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29306, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29307, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29308, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29309, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29310, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29311, "", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29312, " ", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29313, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         addHoverText(29314, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
         } catch(Exception e){
            e.printStackTrace();
      }   
   }

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @asmo11 asmo11
item.description:
@asmo11 wrote:

Ok but when i try to remove anything from RSI and then save/compile etc… then i click the quest tab it crashes?

All the things in red i removed

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){
RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638);
setChildren(4, Interface);
addText(29155, “Quests”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
AddInterfaceButton(29156, 1, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”, 18, 18, “archievement tab”, 1);

setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface);
Interface = addInterface(29160);
Interface.height = 214;
Interface.width = 165;
Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
Interface.newScroller = false;
setChildren(105, Interface);
addText(29161, “Owner :”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
addHoverText(29162, “Rex”, “Owners”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addText(29163, “Register on :”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
addHoverText(29164, “http://dragonic-scape.tk/”, “Register”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface);
setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface);
setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface);
setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface);
setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface);
int Ypos = 83;
int frameID = 5;
for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){
addHoverText(iD, “”, “View Quest”/"View Quest Journal, "+iD/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface);
frameID++;
Ypos += 15;
Ypos++;
}
Interface = addInterface(29265);
try {
setChildren(4, Interface);
addText(29266, " ", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
AddInterfaceButton(29267, 2, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”, 18, 18, “Swap to Quest Diary”, 1);

Interface = addInterface(29268);

setBounds(29295, 8, 4, 0, Interface);

setBounds(29300, 8, 66, 5, Interface);

setBounds(29302, 8, 90, 7, Interface);
setBounds(29303, 8, 102, 8, Interface);
setBounds(29304, 8, 114, 9, Interface);
setBounds(29305, 8, 126, 10, Interface);
setBounds(29306, 8, 138, 11, Interface);
setBounds(29307, 8, 150, 12, Interface);
setBounds(29308, 8, 162, 13, Interface);
setBounds(29309, 8, 174, 14, Interface);
setBounds(29310, 8, 186, 15, Interface);
setBounds(29311, 8, 198, 16, Interface);

setBounds(29314, 8, 234, 19, Interface);
addHoverText(29295, “”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);

item.title: Quest Interface Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“asmo11, post:3, topic:528348”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=647097.msg4351711#msg4351711 date=1376766936]
The “guy” is a sprite that’s in your cache.
Owner, website, and free quests is all in RSInterface.java (client sided)
[/quote]
How can i stop the client from reading the image in my cache?[/quote]
Again, RSInterface.java, client sided.
Or you can just edit the image that it’s reading so it’s just the standard background.
